# praiseme

The goal of praiseme is to deliver praise to the one true user

## Installation

You can install praiseme from github with:

```{r gh-installation, eval = FALSE}
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("pmontman/praiseme")
```

## Example

Lead by example

```{r example}
library(praiseme)
praise()
```
